articles.author: VOA Learning English
articles.title: Researchers Uncover ‘Secrets’ of African Sand Dune - VOA Learning English
articles.description: Researchers used radar and other technologies to study a large “star” sand dune in eastern Morocco. The oldest parts of the base of the dune are estimated to be about 13,000 years old.
articles.content:
Researchers have used radar and other technologies to study a large star sand dune in eastern Morocco. The team said it was able to capture detailed data on how these dunes form and develop.
